gov.va.med.srcalc.vista

Interface VistaPersonDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RpcVistaPersonDao

    public interface VistaPersonDao

    Data Access Object for VistA Persons (i.e., users).

    This is an interface to allow for easy mocking. See RpcVistaPersonDao for the "real" implementation.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      VistaPerson loadVistaPerson(java.lang.String duz)
      Loads a VistaPerson from VistA given his/her DUZ.

    • Method Detail

      • loadVistaPerson

        VistaPerson loadVistaPerson(java.lang.String duz)
        Loads a VistaPerson from VistA given his/her DUZ.
        Throws:
        org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException - if communication with VistA failed
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the DUZ was not a valid DUZ
